description: Template library for LoRA training dataset - single polygon outlines
author: Mr. Chuck
comments: Reusable templates for procedural polygon generation. All shapes are outline-only (no fill) for LoRA training. Copy and customize parameters in executables.

organic_outline_template.description: Organic polygon outline - flowing natural forms
organic_outline_template.comments: Template for organic shapes using sawtooth operations and inward bias. Creates smooth, flowing outlines.
commands: PROC dynamic_polygon ${name} vertices=${verts} bounds=${bounds} iterations=${iters} operations=${ops} direction_bias=inward break_width_max=${break_width} projection_max=${projection} connect=${connect}
